pageTitle: Nightcap Clothing Isobel Crochet Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Sizing conversion: 1=XS, 2=S, 3=M, 4=L Size & Fit Length: 30in / 76cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA with trim from France. Wash cold. Trim: 100% cotton. Shell: 96% pima cotton/4% lycra spandex. Fabric: Soft jersey. A crocheted bodice panel brings a touch of romance to a jersey mini dress, and a ruched waist lets the skirt move. Cap sleeves keep the look delicate and sweet. Unlined. Sheer bodice. Description Nightcap Clothing Dresses > Nightcap Clothing Clothing > Day to Night > Dresses > Clothing >
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer As loungewear becomes ubiquitous and the line between boudoir and street wear blurs, the stylish woman knows it is possible to be comfortable and sexy at the same time. Carisa Brambles, LA-based founder of the casual label Young Fabulous & Broke takes this comfy-chic approach to a new level with her contemporary designs that re-imagine everything from cover-ups to cashmere. Lace accents, equestrian influences, and a flair for femininity all flourish in the provocative Nightcap Clothing collection.
